title: [GAMEPLAY] Supress does not stop WuKong during ult
body: This bug happens 100% of the time. The scenario is the when WuKong uses his ult, and then Malzahar uses his ult to suppress WuKong, the damage from Malzahars ult is dealt but Wukong is not suppressed and is able to move around knocking up teammates wherever he pleases. I am not sure if this occurs with Warwicks ult. However, this occurs 100% when done in the above mentioned method. I thank you in advance for looking into this horrible bug.

replies.body: He's unaffected by the suppression meaning he can still move. Same as a Olaf ult
Although I did just ult a Zac mid ult and he continued to ult.... That is not supposed to happen
You can't stop him from spinning. It's just like Garen spin, nothing stop it.
even so, he shouldn't be able to move around while being suppressed. he should spin in place like a tipsy top
he had quicksilver sash? it removes suppression but not damage
no items, just seemed like it was a bug of some sort, not sure if its still occurring.
